content: Bank Account Asked by Aditya LesmanaAsked on 08 Oct 2018Which banks in Singapore offer "free" cheque book facility?1 answerAnswerBump1

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Oct 2018Stanchart. Have been using their super salary account for like 6 years and the cheque books are free. Citibank does give the first cheque book for free but subsequent ones are at 15 each. I usually get it replenished automatically but didn't check on the fee deduction 0 comments0
